Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dallas Mavericks won against the Portland Trail Blazers with a score of 117-111.
Klay Thompson played 22 minutes against the Portland Trail Blazers.
Others: Klay Thompson finished the game with 3 points, 3 rebounds, 4 assists, and 1 steal.

Klay Thompson is in his first season with the Dallas Mavericks and is averaging 13.8 points, 3.4 rebounds, and 2.0 assists per contest while shooting 41.1% from the field and 38.1% from the three-point range in 33 games.
